summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It records inmate counts and out-counts by housing unit, and includes a section for official count slips. The document appears to be routine prison administrative paperwork from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing census by housing unit and out-counts.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated August 9, 2019.
Shows inmate census totals by housing unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Includes out-count forms for tracking inmates outside their housing units during counts.
Represents routine administrative prison documentation from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.
No specific individuals are named in the legible portions of the document.
